column1: Due to COVID we are hosting our watch party virtually this year. Join us to watch the election results roll in on Facebook Live at 7:45 PM! https://t.co/XPKOjfbCBJ

As COVID hospitalizations hit record highs voters deserve to know where candidates stand on health care. Today I’m calling on @StephanieBice to release the details of her plan. Abolishing the ACA in the middle of a pandemic isn’t a plan – it’s a disaster. https://t.co/zCbW7LinrI

My bill provides educators an additional 25 percent hazard pay for the time they have to spend in person at schools during COVID-19.   Our educators truly are heroes and they deserve to be treated like it. I’ll always fight for our students teachers and schools.   #OK05Debate https://t.co/Oe02r0NXce

Congress provided funding in the CARES Act to supply our public schools with PPE virtual learning tools and school meals.   Because we took action @OKCPS went from serving 18000 meals to over half a million to children and families in need during COVID-19. #OK05Debate https://t.co/7CLtt2s6am

Abolishing the Affordable Care Act would leave hundreds of thousands of Oklahomans uninsured during a pandemic. Replacing their insurance with a savings account wouldn't come close to covering the cost of care especially if they got COVID. This isn't a plan - it's a disaster. https://t.co/KVvmbPV6dy

Today my opponent said we should abolish the ACA and replace health insurance with health savings accounts. That’s not a plan- that’s a disaster.  The average cost of a COVID hospital stay with no insurance is $73k. A health savings account won’t even come close to covering that https://t.co/abiOhr3wno

Like countless other Oklahoman small business owners Beth LaFave thought she would have to  close her doors when COVID-19 hit. I’m proud that I was able to help her get the support she needed to overcome the pandemic and stay in business. https://t.co/aAgxWDzK7t

Voting is not about a person or party -- it’s about getting your voice heard. It’s a fundamental part of our democracy that COVID-19 should not restrict. Apply to vote by mail today: https://t.co/XBgplSHZfv https://t.co/fsgAjSgOsn

1 in 4 Americans have contemplated suicide since the start of COVID-19.  Good health care must include coverage for mental health services -- especially now as we battle a pandemic causing heightened stress and other mental health challenges for millions of Americans.
Wear a mask + social distance = save lives! https://t.co/AO5TVCeaAp

Our campaign is also offering free social distanced and sanitized notary services across #ok05.   Click here for a list of campaign notary locations and other events: https://t.co/UreNFdoiwX  And remember no one can charge to notarize a ballot in Oklahoma!
